ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Chants vs. Melee (was Bards forgotten again.... )
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello! Sorry, I dont know.  Since the chain nerf, I have not tried using it.  My old crew with the SK who used to insist on doing the Darknessing has not been
ygData.messageBody:
Hello!

Sorry, I dont know. Since the chain nerf, I have not tried using it. My
old crew with the SK who used to insist on doing the Darknessing has not
been together in quite sometime. Currently, I group with a cleric and we
do the root/dot/nuke thing. The cleric roots and refeshes root often while
I sing DoT's with my Selos drum. When they (spectres in TT) get low, the
cleric will stun, banish undead, stun to prevent them from gating. Although
the ones we have been camping, dont gate all that far. Funny thing is, if
they are rooted and gate, they are still rooted when they re-appear at their
bind points - heh. So, I just keep Dot'ing them.

Sylly

> Tomerrilin
>
> PS. Sylly, does Chains still break the darkness line of spells?
